snippet.title: Laptops for dummies
snippet.description: Laptops for dummies . \- 2nd ed. / Gookin, Dan Are you thinking about buying a laptop, but you're not sure what to look for, how to choose one, or how to use it? Or maybe you already have a laptop and just want to learn more about its features, functions, and capabilities [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2013. - 387 p.
